Name: Omega Galaxy
Details: Reformed in 3063, Khan Ward created Omega Galaxy as a means to concentrate Warden politically aligned Warriors of the then largely aggressive Crusader controlled Clan.  The Galaxy was largely despised by most of the Crusader Clansman and was dispatched on missions seen as beneath the favored warriors of the Clan. Omega Galaxy is stationed in the Periphery, where it is regularly sent on the task of hunting pirates.
